message.body: That is the address don't worry about getting there before 830. Have a great Shabbat

I am likely to be driving my wife and children back to our house Saturday night around 7 or 730 and I could pick you up so you do not have to bike and then I will drive you back at the end of the night@
Thanks, dont worry, I'm happy to bike-I like the freedom and the exercise. Shabbat shalom, see you tomorrow
Ha sounds good, looking forward to tomorrow
